keyword: calories in beef filet mignon 6 oz
title: Calories in 6 oz Beef Filet Mignon
meta_description: Discover calories in beef filet mignon 6 oz, including protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and easy tweaks for cooking variations.
h1: Calories in 6 oz Beef Filet Mignon
assumptions: Lean beef filet mignon, cooked (broiled or grilled), trimmed of visible fat, no added salt, oil, or marinades.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, added fats, and portion accuracy. Check labels or USDA data when available.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz cooked filet mignon provides ~304 kcal and ~47 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Pan-seared with 1 tsp oil per 100 g
Add 1 tbsp butter sauce per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in 6 oz filet mignon?
faqs.a: Approximately 304 kcal for cooked, lean beef filet mignon.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 6 oz beef filet mignon?

faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugarsâ€”it's nearly all protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in filet mignon?
faqs.a: Cooking reduces weight due to moisture loss, concentrating nutrients; values here are for cooked weight.
Yes, lean cuts have ~7.3 g fat per 100 g, but added oils or butter increase it.
